name: sunlight. (knitjumper)
description:
After a long hiatus and a MASSIVE overhaul (i.e. I rebuilt the entire level from scratch), here is the second build of my 3d platformer, sunlight!

Arrows/WASD to move

Space to jump

Mouse controls the camera

There are still several things that need completing before a full release, but I would love to know what you think of it as it is. Is it an interesting world to explore? Do youlike the aesthetic? Does it have good vibes?
